description: Bridges: Type should be defined for param `idCustomer` in method `Spryker\Zed\CustomerGroupDiscountConnector\Dependency\Facade\CustomerGroupDiscountConnectorToCustomerGroupFacadeBridge::getCustomerGroupCollectionByIdCustomer()`.
Bridges: Method `getCustomerGroupCollectionByIdCustomer()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `getCustomerGroupCollectionByIdCustomer()`. Got `$idCustomer` but expected to be `int $idCustomer`. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"

Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `queryStringCompare()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
